text: The Lord thy God hath blessed thee in every work of thy hands. The Lord thy God, dwelling with thee, knoweth thy journey, how thou hast passed through this great wilderness, for forty years, and thou hast wanted nothing.

segments.text: The Lord thy God hath blessed thee in every work of thy hands.
The Lord thy God, dwelling with thee, knoweth thy journey, how thou hast passed through
this great wilderness, for forty years, and thou hast wanted nothing.
